item.title: Plug, Play, and Prey: The security risks of the Model Context Protocol
item.description: Amit Magen Medina, Data Scientist, Defender for Cloud ResearchIdan Hen, Principal Data Science Manager, Defender for Cloud Research Introduction MCP's growing adoption is transforming system integration. By standardizing access, MCP enables developers to easily build powerful, agentic AI experiences with minimal integration overhead. However, this convenience also introduces unprecedented security risks.
